analyzed: dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul byas te //

analyzed: skye bo phal chen mgo mang bye ba gcod byed pa'i //

analyzed: de ltar byang chub la 'jug zhum pa'i sems med pa //

original: mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs pa 'gro mi dmigs //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs pa 'gro mi dmigs //

analyzed: dper na mi shi de yis 'gro rgyu med pa bzhin //

analyzed: rgyu des de ni mya ngan 'das zhes rab tu brjod //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang // da ltar byung bar mi dmigs dus gsum dag pa ste //

original: gang dag de ni 'dus ma byas yin spros med de //
analyzed: gang dag de ni 'dus ma byas yin spros med de //

original: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
translated: This is the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig gang gi dus kyi tshe //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig gang gi dus kyi tshe //

analyzed: snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med; ;'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
translated: This is the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gal te sems can 'du shes sdug bsngal 'du shes bskyed //

analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi don bya sdug bsngal spang snyam ste //

analyzed: bdag dang sems can yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste //

analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //

original: skye ba med dang skye ba gnyi gar mi rtog pa //
analyzed: skye ba med dang skye ba gnyi gar mi rtog pa //

original: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
translated: This is the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: ye shes 'chi med dam pa de las gzhan med 'thob //

original: de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya //
analyzed: de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig dogs med de @256a *//

analyzed: ltar spyod // shes rab ldan te mnyam nyid gnas par shes par bya //
translated: endowed with wisdom, should be known to abide in equanimity.

analyzed: chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongs su shes gyur pa //
translated: Fully knowing that phenomena are devoid of intrinsic nature,

original: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //

analyzed: gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems par mi gnas la //

analyzed: rnam shes gang mi gnas pa chos nyid gnas pa ste //

original: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
translated: This is the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug /

analyzed: de bzhin 'dus byas la'ang mi gnas gnas med spyod //

analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas //

analyzed: gang bdag bde gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya snyam dang // rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos rgyal 'gyur 'dod pa //

analyzed: bzod pa 'di la ma brten 'thob par mi nus te //

original: gang zag bzhi po 'di dag de la mi skrag ste //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig de ltar spyod pa ni //
translated: The wise bodhisattva, knowing this, practices

analyzed: 'du shes rnam par @257a *//

analyzed: bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro /

analyzed: gang dag 'du shes bral ba 'di ni rjes thob pa //

analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //

analyzed: nga lung bstan par gyur ces rgyal ba de skad gsung //

analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa gang la mgon spyod pa //
translated: “The protector practices the perfection of wisdom

original: 'di ni gang zhig gus byas 'dzin dang chub byed pa //
analyzed: 'di ni gang zhig gus byas 'dzin dang chub byed pa //
translated: In which one should respectfully uphold and master

analyzed: de la dug dang mtshon dang me dang chus mi tshugs //
translated: The one who does so will not be harmed by poison, weapons, fire, or water,

analyzed: bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis glags kyang rnyed mi 'gyur //

analyzed: la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi //
translated: “Someone may make offerings to the stūpas of the Blissfully Gone

analyzed: mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la //
translated: Made of the seven precious substances,

analyzed: las gzhan mi byed lha yi me tog spos rab dang // byug pas dus gsum bskal pa'am de bas lhag mchod la //

analyzed: gang @257b zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba //

analyzed: bde bar gshegs kyi yum 'di glegs bam la bris te //

analyzed: sems can khams med mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed // gang dag 'das dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon //

analyzed: rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med 'gyur //

analyzed: pha rol phyin lnga byang chub yon tan ji snyed pa //

analyzed: 'khor los sgyur rgyal lam gang nas ni rtag 'gro ba; ;lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun //

original: gang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro //
analyzed: gang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro //
translated: Wherever this perfection of wisdom of the Victor goes,

original: de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: on that very path all the qualities of the Dharma go.

original: rgyal bas brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol pa //
analyzed: rgyal bas brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol pa //
translated: The Victor, asked by Śakra, gave this answer:

original: gal te gangg'a'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la //
analyzed: gal te gangg'a'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la //
translated: Even if buddhafields as numerous as the sands of the Ganges

original: de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byur bur gtams gyur kyang //
analyzed: de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byur bur gtams gyur kyang //
translated: Were filled to the top with the relics of the Victorious Ones,

original: bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyi @258a *//🔽pa 'di nyid len //
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyi @258a *// pa 'di nyid len //
translated: I would still prefer this perfection of wisdom.

original: ci slad ce na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags //
analyzed: ci slad ce na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags //
translated: Why is that? It is not that I have no respect for the relics,

original: 'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas mchod par bgyid //
analyzed: 'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas mchod par bgyid //
translated: But I worship them by cultivating wisdom.

original: dper na rgyal po rten mi rim gro thob pa ltar //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po rten mi rim gro thob pa ltar //
translated: Just as a servant receives honor by relying on a king,

original: sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la brten //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la brten //
translated: The relics of the Buddha rely on the perfection of wisdom.

original: nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin thang med //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin thang med //
translated: A precious jewel endowed with all good qualities is priceless,

original: gab tse gang du stsal pa de ni phyag bgyi 'os //
analyzed: gab tse gang du stsal pa de ni phyag bgyi 'os //
translated: And the box in which it is kept is also worthy of respect.

original: de phyung gyur kyang gab tse la ni dga' bgyid de //
analyzed: de phyung gyur kyang gab tse la ni dga' bgyid de //
translated: Even when the jewel is removed, one still honors the box,

original: yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de yi lags //🔽de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis //
analyzed: yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de yi lags // de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis //
translated: Because of the good qualities of that precious jewel.🔽In the same way, the relics of the Victorious One, who has passed into nirvāṇa,

original: rgyal ba mya ngan 'das kyang ring bsrel mchod pa brnyes //
analyzed: rgyal ba mya ngan 'das kyang ring bsrel mchod pa brnyes //
translated: Are worshipped because of the good qualities of the supreme perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin 'tshal des //
analyzed: de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin 'tshal des //
translated: Therefore, whoever holds the qualities of the Victorious Ones

original: shes rab pha rol phyin blang 'di ni thar pa lags //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin blang 'di ni thar pa lags //
translated: Should take up the perfection of wisdom, for this is liberation.

original: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba shes rab ste //
analyzed: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba shes rab ste //
translated: Wisdom is the forerunner of the practice of generosity,

original: tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin no //
translated: And likewise of discipline, patience, diligence, and concentration.

original: dge chos chud mi gzan phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: dge chos chud mi gzan phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin //
translated: It is the protector that prevents the loss of virtuous qualities,

original: 'di ni chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig ston par byed //
analyzed: 'di ni chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig ston par byed //
translated: And it reveals the single way of all phenomena.

original: dper na dzambu'i gling na shing rnams bye ba stong //
analyzed: dper na dzambu'i gling na shing rnams bye ba stong //
translated: For example, in Jambudvīpa there are billions of trees

original: rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma gzugs mang ba //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma gzugs mang ba //
translated: With many different forms and shapes.🔽Apart from being counted as shadows,

original: grib mar gyur pa'i grangs su brjod pa ma gtogs par; ;grib ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag yod ma yin //
analyzed: grib mar gyur pa'i grangs su brjod pa ma gtogs par; ;grib ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag yod ma yin //
translated: There are no various shadows, nor are there any distinctions.

original: de bzhin rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang //
translated: In the same way, these five perfections of the Victorious Ones

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i ming nyid thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i ming nyid thob par 'gyur //
translated: Attain the name of perfection of wisdom.

original: thams cad @258b mkhyen pa nyid phyir yongs su bsngos byas na //
analyzed: thams cad @258b mkhyen pa nyid phyir yongs su bsngos byas na //
translated: And dedicates it all to omniscience,

original: byang chub ces byar drug po 'di kun ro gcig 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub ces byar drug po 'di kun ro gcig 'gyur //
translated: All these six are said to be of one taste in enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gal te rab tu mi shes bzhin //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gal te rab tu mi shes bzhin //
translated: If a bodhisattva, though not fully knowing,

original: gzugs dang 'du shes tshor dang sems pa rnam par shes //
analyzed: gzugs dang 'du shes tshor dang sems pa rnam par shes //
translated: Were to teach form, perception, feeling, volition, and consciousness

original: mi rtag yongs su ston pa bcos la spyod pa ste //
analyzed: mi rtag yongs su ston pa bcos la spyod pa ste //
translated: As impermanent, that would be a fabrication.

original: mkhas pa nam yang chos rnams 'jig par mi byed do //🔽gang la gzugs min tshor min 'du shes mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: mkhas pa nam yang chos rnams 'jig par mi byed do // gang la gzugs min tshor min 'du shes mi dmigs shing /
translated: The wise do not destroy phenomena.🔽Where form is not observed, nor feeling, perception, or consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin sems pa mi dmigs la //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin sems pa mi dmigs la //
translated: Nor any mental formations,

original: chos kun skye med stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa //
analyzed: chos kun skye med stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa //
translated: And where all phenomena are known to be unborn and empty,

original: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
translated: That is the practice of the perfection of wisdom.🔽If someone were to tame as many beings as there are

original: la las gangg'a'i klung gi bye snyed zhing rnams na //
analyzed: la las gangg'a'i klung gi bye snyed zhing rnams na //
translated: In buddha-fields as numerous as the Ganges sands,

original: sems can ji snyed 'khod kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas //
analyzed: sems can ji snyed 'khod kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas //
translated: And establish them all in the state of an arhat,

original: gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te //
analyzed: gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te //
translated: And if someone else were to write this perfection of wisdom🔽And give it to others, the latter would generate

original: sems can mchog la glegs byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: sems can mchog la glegs byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags //
translated: The merit of giving a volume to a supreme being is superior.

original: ci phyir zhe na smra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas //
analyzed: ci phyir zhe na smra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas //
translated: Why is that? Because, having trained here in this supreme speech,

original: chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed //
analyzed: chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed //
translated: they teach here that all phenomena are emptiness.

original: de thos nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg /
analyzed: de thos nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg /
translated: Having heard that, the śrāvakas quickly reach the attainment of liberation.

original: rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg /
analyzed: rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg /
translated: They reach the awakening of the pratyekabuddhas and the awakening of buddhahood.

original: myu gu med par 'jig rten sdong 'byung yod med na //
analyzed: myu gu med par 'jig rten sdong 'byung yod med na //
translated: If, without a sprout, a tree does not exist in the world,

original: de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras bu ga la 'byung //
analyzed: de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras bu ga la 'byung //
translated: how could there be leaves, flowers, and fruit on it?

original: byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yod med na //
analyzed: byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yod med na //
translated: If, without the thought of awakening, a victor does not exist in the world,

original: 'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung //
analyzed: 'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung //
translated: how could there be the fruits of Śakra, Brahmā, and the śrāvakas?

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed //
translated: When the orb of the sun radiates a net of light rays,

original: de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de @259a *//
analyzed: de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de @259a *//
translated: then sentient beings are diligent in their work.

original: bzhin du // mkhas pa shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na //
analyzed: bzhin du // mkhas pa shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na //
translated: In the same way, when the wise ones have the thought of awakening in the world,

original: ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan //
analyzed: ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan //
translated: through their wisdom sentient beings are endowed with the qualities of the Dharma.

original: dper na ma dros mtsho la klu bdag med gyur na //
analyzed: dper na ma dros mtsho la klu bdag med gyur na //
translated: For example, if there were no nāga lords in Lake Anavatapta,

original: dzambu'i gling 'dir chu klung 'bab par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: dzambu'i gling 'dir chu klung 'bab par ga la 'gyur //
translated: how could the rivers flow in this world?

original: chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: Without rivers, there would be no flowers or fruits,

original: rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur //
translated: and the ocean would lack its many precious forms.

original: de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi //
translated: In the same way, if there were no thought of awakening here,

original: ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga la 'byung //
analyzed: ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga la 'byung //
translated: how could the Sugata’s wisdom appear in this world?

original: ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub ldan //
analyzed: ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub ldan //
translated: Without wisdom, there would be no increase in good qualities or enlightenment,

original: rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur //
translated: and the ocean-like Dharma of the Buddha would not exist.

original: 'jig rten 'di na snang byed srog chags ji snyed pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di na snang byed srog chags ji snyed pa //
translated: All the luminous beings in this world

original: kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams byung ba bas //
analyzed: kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams byung ba bas //
translated: emit light in order to illuminate.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig phyung chos mchog ste //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig phyung chos mchog ste //
translated: But the light of a single ray from the orb of the sun is supreme,

original: snang byed tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char me phod //
analyzed: snang byed tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char me phod //
translated: and the light of all the luminous beings is not even a fraction of that.

original: nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bsgom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams tshogs skyed pa'ang //
analyzed: nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bsgom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams tshogs skyed pa'ang //
translated: Through generosity, morality, and meditation,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang sems gcig la //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang sems gcig la //
translated: The bodhisattvas rejoice in all of it with a single thought.

original: nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos char mi phod //
analyzed: nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos char mi phod //
translated: The mass of merit of the hosts of śrāvakas cannot compare.

original: 'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig gang //
analyzed: 'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig gang //
translated: All the buddhas of the past, the ten quadrillions🔽Who dwell in the many infinite, boundless, and vast buddhafields,

original: zhing mang mtha' yas bye stong dag na gang bzhugs dang // gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams //
analyzed: zhing mang mtha' yas bye stong dag na gang bzhugs dang // gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams //
translated: And the lords of the world who have passed into nirvāṇa,🔽Who taught the precious Dharma to end suffering,

original: sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen chos ston @259b pa; ;dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed bskyed pa nas //
analyzed: sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen chos ston @259b pa; ;dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed bskyed pa nas //
translated: From the time they first gave rise to the mind set on supreme awakening,

original: rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus //
analyzed: rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus //
translated: Until the Dharma of those guides has disappeared,

original: de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa //
analyzed: de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa //
translated: The merit of those victors

original: pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas chos gang dang // gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang // slob dang mi slob dge ba zag bcas zag med pa //
analyzed: pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas chos gang dang // gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang // slob dang mi slob dge ba zag bcas zag med pa //
translated: the contaminated and the uncontaminated,

original: bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang zhing //
analyzed: bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang zhing //
translated: the Bodhisattvas rejoice in all of them.🔽And they dedicate them all to enlightenment

original: 'gro ba'i don rgyu byang chub phyir ni thams cad bsngo //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don rgyu byang chub phyir ni thams cad bsngo //
translated: for the sake of beings, as a cause for their welfare and happiness.

original: yongs bsngo gal te sems su 'du shes 'byung 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: yongs bsngo gal te sems su 'du shes 'byung 'gyur zhing //
translated: If, when dedicating, the Bodhisattvas have the notion of a mind,

original: byang chub 'du shes yongs bsngo sems can 'du shes na //
analyzed: byang chub 'du shes yongs bsngo sems can 'du shes na //
translated: the notion of enlightenment, and the notion of beings,

original: 'du shes phyir na lta gnas sems ni gsum la chags //
analyzed: 'du shes phyir na lta gnas sems ni gsum la chags //
translated: then, because of these notions, their minds are attached to the three spheres.

original: dmigs pa yod pas yongs su bsngo bar chud ma yin //
analyzed: dmigs pa yod pas yongs su bsngo bar chud ma yin //
translated: And their dedication is not pure.🔽But if they know that all these phenomena are ceased and exhausted,🔽and that the object to which they dedicate is also ceased and exhausted,

original: gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang // gang du yongs su bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // chos kyis chos la nam yang mi bsngo shes gyur na //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang // gang du yongs su bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // chos kyis chos la nam yang mi bsngo shes gyur na //
translated: and that phenomena never dedicate phenomena,

original: de ltar rab tu shes pas yongs su bsngos pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu shes pas yongs su bsngos pa yin //
translated: then, knowing this, they are truly dedicated.

original: gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin //
analyzed: gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin //
translated: If you do it with signs, it is not a dedication.

original: ji ste mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin //
analyzed: ji ste mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin //
translated: If you do it without signs, it is a dedication to enlightenment.

original: ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba //
analyzed: ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba //
translated: Just as you might eat delicious food mixed with poison,

original: dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: The Victorious One has said that observing virtuous qualities is like that.

original: de ltas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba bslab bya ste //
analyzed: de ltas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba bslab bya ste //
translated: Therefore, you should train in this kind of dedication:

original: ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge ba de mkhyen pa'i //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge ba de mkhyen pa'i //
translated: Just as the Victorious Ones know that virtue,

original: rnam pa gang yin 'byung gang mtshan nyid gang yin la //
analyzed: rnam pa gang yin 'byung gang mtshan nyid gang yin la //
translated: And just as it is classified, arises, and has characteristics,

original: rjes su yi rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo //
analyzed: rjes su yi rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo //
translated: In the same way, I rejoice and make dedications.

original: de ltar bsod nams @260a *//
analyzed: de ltar bsod nams @260a *//
translated: In this way, you should dedicate your merit

original: byang chub yongs su bsngo byed na //
analyzed: byang chub yongs su bsngo byed na //
translated: To enlightenment,

original: dug med sangs rgyas mi spong rgyal bas gsungs pa smra //
analyzed: dug med sangs rgyas mi spong rgyal bas gsungs pa smra //
translated: Without poison, not rejecting the Buddha, speaking the Victor’s words.

original: de ltar yongs bsngo dpa' bos 'jig rten dmigs can gyi //
analyzed: de ltar yongs bsngo dpa' bos 'jig rten dmigs can gyi //
translated: In this way, the hero’s dedication outshines

original: byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed thams cad zil gyis gnon //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed thams cad zil gyis gnon //
translated: All the world’s contemplations, and all the bodhisattvas’.

original: dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams //
analyzed: dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams //
translated: Billions of blind people without a guide

original: lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur //
translated: How can they enter the city without knowing the path?

original: shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di //
analyzed: shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di //
translated: Without wisdom, these five perfections are blind.

original: dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin //
analyzed: dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin //
translated: Without a guide, they cannot reach enlightenment.

original: gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu zin gyur na //
analyzed: gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu zin gyur na //
translated: But when they are grasped by wisdom,

original: de tshe mig rnyed gyur cing 'di yi ming thob bo //
analyzed: de tshe mig rnyed gyur cing 'di yi ming thob bo //
translated: then they obtain the name of perfections and obtain the eye.

original: dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa //
analyzed: dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa //
translated: For example, a painting without eyes

original: ji srid mig ma bris pas rngan pa mi thob bzhin //
analyzed: ji srid mig ma bris pas rngan pa mi thob bzhin //
translated: does not obtain its reward until the eyes are painted.

original: gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos //
analyzed: gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos //
translated: When the conditioned and the unconditioned, the virtuous and the nonvirtuous

original: shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe //
analyzed: shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe //
translated: are destroyed by wisdom and not even an atom is observed,

original: 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro /
analyzed: 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro /
translated: then in the world one is counted as having the perfection of wisdom,

original: nam mkha' gang la'ang cung zad mi gnas de ngang 'dra //
analyzed: nam mkha' gang la'ang cung zad mi gnas de ngang 'dra //
translated: and one is like space, which does not rest on anything.

original: gal te bdag ni rgyal ba'i shes rab spyad bya zhing //
analyzed: gal te bdag ni rgyal ba'i shes rab spyad bya zhing //
translated: If one practices the wisdom of the Victor

original: sems can sdug bsngal reg pa khrag khrig mang dgrol sems //
analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal reg pa khrag khrig mang dgrol sems //
translated: and thinks to liberate the many hundreds of sentient beings who are in contact with suffering,

original: sems can 'du shes yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste //
analyzed: sems can 'du shes yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste //
translated: “A bodhisattva who has the idea of a sentient being,

original: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod ma yin //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod ma yin //
translated: Is not practicing the supreme perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe //
translated: A bodhisattva who in the past

original: pha rol phyin 'dir spyod pa mkhas pa som nyi med //
analyzed: pha rol phyin 'dir spyod pa mkhas pa som nyi med //
translated: Has practiced this perfection of wisdom, is wise and has no doubts.

original: thos ma thag tu @260b des ni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed //
analyzed: thos ma thag tu @260b des ni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed //
translated: As soon as he hears it, he has the idea that it is the Teacher.

original: des ni byang chub zhi ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: des ni byang chub zhi ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur //

original: sngon spyod tshe na sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang //
analyzed: sngon spyod tshe na sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang //

analyzed: rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin la ma dad na //

original: de lta bas na gal te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog /
analyzed: de lta bas na gal te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog /

analyzed: reg par 'dod na rgyal ba'i yum 'dir dad par gyis //

original: dper na tshong pa rin chen gling du song nas ni //
analyzed: dper na tshong pa rin chen gling du song nas ni //

analyzed: gzugs kyi dag pa 'bras bu dag par rig par bya // 'bras bu gzugs dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dag par 'gyur //

original: thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa //

analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med gcad du med //

original: dpa' bo gar spyod shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis //
analyzed: dpa' bo gar spyod shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis //

analyzed: nyon mongs bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston par byed //

analyzed: 'gro ba'i 'di dag ming dang gzugs kyi 'dam la chags //

analyzed: rlung gi 'khor lo lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyam //

analyzed: 'gro ba 'khrul pa ri dvags rgyar chud 'drar shes nas //

analyzed: par mi spyod na //

analyzed: de ltar spyod pa chags pa thams cad yongs spong zhing //

analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba //

analyzed: nyi ma sgra gcan gza' bral lhang nger 'dug pa dang // me btang rtsva dang shing dang nags tshal bsreg pa bzhin //

analyzed: chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag cing yongs dag par //

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin lta na //

analyzed: phung por mi brtson de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson //

analyzed: gang zhig chos 'di sprul dang sgyu ma 'drar thos nas //

analyzed: som nyi med cing slob la phyir zhing spyod byed pa //

analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mang la lhag byas yin //
translated: and who has served many quintillions of buddhas.🔽”

analyzed: dgon pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang por zhugs pa'i mis //

analyzed: gnag rdzi mtshams kyi nags tshal phun sum tshogs mthong nas //

analyzed: 'di dag grong dang grong khyer nye bar brtags snyam ste //
translated: Thinking, ‘I will investigate whether there is a town or city nearby,’

analyzed: @261b dbugs phyin rnyed par 'gyur zhing tshom rkun 'jigs pa med //
translated: he finds relief and is free from the danger of bandits.🔽”

analyzed: de bzhin byang chub yongs su 'tshol tshe rgyal rnams kyi //
translated: In the same way, when the Victors are seeking enlightenment,

analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin 'di mnyan pa gang thob pa //

original: de ni dbugs byin thob par gyur cing 'jigs med de //
analyzed: de ni dbugs byin thob par gyur cing 'jigs med de //

analyzed: dgra bcom sa la ma yin rkyen rtogs sa la min //

analyzed: mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba yis //

analyzed: gal ba shing dang nags tshal ri mthong da dung ring //

analyzed: ci ste rtags ma mthong na rgya mtsho chen po ni //

analyzed: de bar byang chub dam par rab zhugs rgyal ba yis //

translated: “Those who have appeared in the past, those who are in the worlds of the ten directions, and those who will appear in the future all come from this.

original: 'jig rten tshon pa rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yum //
analyzed: 'jig rten tshon pa rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yum //
translated: The mother who gives birth to the victorious ones of the world

original: sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed //
translated: reveals the activity of the minds of other beings.

original: 'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: 'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid //
translated: “The suchness of the world, the suchness of the worthy ones,

original: rang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang rgyal sras de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: rang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang rgyal sras de bzhin nyid //
translated: the suchness of the solitary buddhas, and the suchness of the bodhisattvas,

original: gcig pa nyid de dngos bral gzhan min de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid de dngos bral gzhan min de bzhin nyid //
translated: It is the same, not different, free from things, suchness.

original: shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is known by the Tathāgata.

original: mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung //
translated: Whether the wise one remains in the world or attains nirvāṇa,

original: chos nyid skyon med chos rnams stong pa 'di gnas te //
analyzed: chos nyid skyon med chos rnams stong pa 'di gnas te //
translated: This reality, faultless, the emptiness of phenomena, remains.

original: byang chub sems dpas de bzhin nyid 'di rjes su rtogs //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas de bzhin nyid 'di rjes su rtogs //
translated: The bodhisattva realizes this suchness.

original: de phyir de bzhin gshegs zhes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to //
analyzed: de phyir de bzhin gshegs zhes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to //
translated: Therefore, he is called the Tathāgata, the Buddha.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa dga' tshal la brten pa //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa dga' tshal la brten pa //
translated: Relying on the pleasure grove of the perfection of wisdom,

original: stobs bcu rnam 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te //
analyzed: stobs bcu rnam 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te //
translated: This is the domain of the ten powers, the guides.

original: sems can sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las yongs 'don kyang //
analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las yongs 'don kyang //
translated: Though they deliver beings from the three lower realms of suffering,

original: de dag nam yang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: de dag nam yang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med //
translated: They never have the notion of a being.

original: dper na seng ge ri sul @263b brten nas 'jigs med par //
analyzed: dper na seng ge ri sul @263b brten nas 'jigs med par //
translated: For example, like a lion dwelling in a mountain cave, fearless,

original: ri dvags phra mo mang skrag byed cing sgra sgrog ltar //
analyzed: ri dvags phra mo mang skrag byed cing sgra sgrog ltar //
translated: Terrifying many small animals and roaring,

original: mi yi seng ge shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas //
analyzed: mi yi seng ge shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas //
translated: The lion among men, relying on the perfection of wisdom,

original: mu stegs can yang skrag byed 'jig rten sgra'ang sgrog /
analyzed: mu stegs can yang skrag byed 'jig rten sgra'ang sgrog /
translated: terrifies the tīrthikas and resounds through the world.

original: dper na nam mkhar gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ni //
analyzed: dper na nam mkhar gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ni //
translated: For example, the light rays of the sun, which is situated in the sky,

original: sa 'di skems par byed cing gzugs kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: sa 'di skems par byed cing gzugs kyang rab tu ston //
translated: dry up this earth and reveal forms.

original: de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rol phyin brten pa //
analyzed: de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rol phyin brten pa //
translated: In the same way, the Dharma King, relying on the perfection of wisdom,

original: srid pa'i chu klung skems shing chos kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: srid pa'i chu klung skems shing chos kyang rab tu ston //
translated: dries up the river of existence and reveals the Dharma.

original: gzugs rnams mi mthong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing //
analyzed: gzugs rnams mi mthong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing //
translated: One does not see forms, one does not see feelings,

original: 'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa mi mthong zhing //
analyzed: 'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa mi mthong zhing //
translated: one does not see perceptions, one does not see volitions,

original: gang la rnam par shes dang sems yid mthong med pa //
analyzed: gang la rnam par shes dang sems yid mthong med pa //
translated: and one does not see consciousness, mind, or mentality.

original: 'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan //
analyzed: 'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan //
translated: This is seeing the Dharma, the Tathāgata has taught.

original: nam mkha'i mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod la //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod la //
translated: Sentient beings say, “We see space.”

original: nam mkha' ji ltar mthong ste don 'di brtag par gyis //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar mthong ste don 'di brtag par gyis //
translated: How is space seen? Consider this point.

original: de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan //
analyzed: de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan //
translated: The Tathāgata has taught that seeing phenomena in this way is seeing reality.

original: mthong ba dpe gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par nus ma yin //
analyzed: mthong ba dpe gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par nus ma yin //
translated: This seeing cannot be described by any other example.

original: gang gis de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun mthong //
analyzed: gang gis de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun mthong //
translated: Whoever sees in this way sees all phenomena.

original: rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed ltar //
analyzed: rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed ltar //
translated: Just as a king sits at ease while his ministers do everything,

original: sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa //
translated: so too the deeds of the Buddha and all the teachings of the śrāvakas

original: de dag thams cad shes rab pha rol phyin pa byed //
analyzed: de dag thams cad shes rab pha rol phyin pa byed //
translated: are all done by the perfection of wisdom.

original: rgyal po grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi 'gro la //
analyzed: rgyal po grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi 'gro la //
translated: Just as a king does not go to the towns or the countryside

original: rang gi yul nas 'du ba thams cad sdud pa ltar //
analyzed: rang gi yul nas 'du ba thams cad sdud pa ltar //
translated: but all the revenue from his own land is gathered for him,

original: byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid gang du'ang mi 'gro la //🔽sangs rgyas sa yi yon tan @264a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid gang du'ang mi 'gro la // sangs rgyas sa yi yon tan @264a *//
translated: so too the bodhisattva does not go anywhere in reality

original: gang yin thams cad sdud //
analyzed: gang yin thams cad sdud //
translated: but all the qualities of the buddha stage are gathered for him.

original: gang la bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dad brtan yod //
analyzed: gang la bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dad brtan yod //
translated: Whoever has firm faith in the Sugata’s bodhisattvas

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog la bsam sbyor ba //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog la bsam sbyor ba //
translated: and applies himself to the supreme perfection of wisdom,

original: nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shin tu 'das byas nas //
analyzed: nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shin tu 'das byas nas //
translated: having gone beyond the two stages of śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha,

original: zil gyis mi non rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du thob //
analyzed: zil gyis mi non rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du thob //
translated: They will quickly attain the enlightenment of the Victorious Ones.

original: dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru ni chag gyur la //
analyzed: dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru ni chag gyur la //
translated: For example, when a ship is wrecked in the ocean,

original: mi gang ro 'am rtsa 'am shing ni mi 'dzin pa //
analyzed: mi gang ro 'am rtsa 'am shing ni mi 'dzin pa //
translated: Those who do not grasp at corpses, plants, or wood

original: chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te dogs su phyin mi 'gyur //
analyzed: chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te dogs su phyin mi 'gyur //
translated: Will perish in the water and not reach dry land.

original: gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur //
translated: But those who grasp at a corpse will reach the other shore of the ocean.

original: de ltar dad ldan dang ba thob pa gang zhig ni //
analyzed: de ltar dad ldan dang ba thob pa gang zhig ni //
translated: In the same way, those who have faith and have attained clarity

original: shes rab pha rol phyin yum rjes su mi 'jug min //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin yum rjes su mi 'jug min //
translated: Will not fail to follow the mother, the perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag thabs kyi yon tan shes rab yongs zin na //
analyzed: de dag thabs kyi yon tan shes rab yongs zin na //
translated: If they are held by the wisdom that knows the good qualities of skillful means,

original: mchog tu rmad byung bde gshegs byang chub myur du reg /
analyzed: mchog tu rmad byung bde gshegs byang chub myur du reg /
translated: They will quickly reach the Sugata’s enlightenment, which is most wondrous and blissful.

original: dper na la las rdza som btang chu skyed na //
analyzed: dper na la las rdza som btang chu skyed na //
translated: For example, if someone were to fill a leaky vessel with water

original: nyam chung phyir ni myur du 'jig par rig par bya //
analyzed: nyam chung phyir ni myur du 'jig par rig par bya //
translated: And carry it, they would know that it would quickly break.

original: so btang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jig pa yi //
analyzed: so btang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jig pa yi //
translated: But if they were to fill a sound vessel with water and carry it,

original: 'jigs pa med cing bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med cing bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur //
translated: They would not fear that it would break on the way, and they would safely arrive home.

original: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang //
translated: In the same way, a bodhisattva who has much faith

original: shes rab rnam par nyams na myur du ma rung 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab rnam par nyams na myur du ma rung 'gyur //
translated: but whose wisdom is weak will quickly be lost.

original: dad pas shes rab kyis ni yongs su zin gyur na //
analyzed: dad pas shes rab kyis ni yongs su zin gyur na //
translated: But when faith is held by the power of wisdom,

original: sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur //
analyzed: sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur //
translated: one passes beyond the two extremes and attains supreme enlightenment.

original: dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang //🔽nor dang bcas shing tshor par bcas @264b te 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang // nor dang bcas shing tshor par bcas @264b te 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: For example, a boat that is not well-built sinks in the ocean🔽with its cargo and crew.

original: gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na //
analyzed: gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na //
translated: But a boat that is well-built

original: mi 'jig nor dang bcas par dogs su phyin par gyur //
analyzed: mi 'jig nor dang bcas par dogs su phyin par gyur //
translated: reaches land safely with its cargo.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgos kyang //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgos kyang //
translated: In the same way, a bodhisattva who is imbued with faith

original: shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur //
translated: but lacks wisdom will quickly be lost from enlightenment.

original: de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na //
analyzed: de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na //
translated: But when he is endowed with the supreme perfection of wisdom,

original: ma smas ma nyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma smas ma nyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur //
translated: he will reach the undiminished, uninjured enlightenment of the Victorious Ones.

original: lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing sdug bsngal mi //
analyzed: lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing sdug bsngal mi //
translated: An old man, a hundred and twenty years old, suffering,

original: langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te //
analyzed: langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te //
translated: Even if he gets up, he cannot walk by himself.

original: de ni g-yas g-yon gnyis nas mi yis brten byas na //
analyzed: de ni g-yas g-yon gnyis nas mi yis brten byas na //
translated: But when he is supported on both sides by men,

original: 'gyel ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gyel ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: he can walk without fear of falling.

original: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba //
analyzed: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba //
translated: In the same way, a Bodhisattva who has little strength of wisdom

original: rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang rab tu nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang rab tu nyams par 'gyur //
translated: has set out, but will fall.

original: de nyid thabs mkhas shing rab mchog gis yongs zin na //
analyzed: de nyid thabs mkhas shing rab mchog gis yongs zin na //
translated: But when he is supported by the skillful means of the Tathagatas,

original: mi nyams de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi nyams de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur //
translated: he will not fall, and will reach the enlightenment of the Tathagatas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang //
translated: Those Bodhisattvas who are in the first stage,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa //
translated: who have set out with superior intention for the supreme enlightenment of the Buddhas,

original: slob ma bzang po bla ma gus ldan de dag gis //
analyzed: slob ma bzang po bla ma gus ldan de dag gis //
translated: those good pupils who are full of respect

original: bla ma mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu bsten par bya //
analyzed: bla ma mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu bsten par bya //
translated: should always attend on the wise teachers.

original: ci phyir zhe na mkhas pa'i yon tan de las 'byung //
analyzed: ci phyir zhe na mkhas pa'i yon tan de las 'byung //
translated: Why is that? Because the qualities of the wise come from them.

original: de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston //
analyzed: de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston //
translated: They teach the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la brten to zhes //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la brten to zhes //
translated: The qualities of the Buddha are based on the spiritual friend.

original: yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal @265a *//
analyzed: yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal @265a *//
translated: The Victorious One, who possesses the supreme of all good qualities,

original: ba de skad gsung //
analyzed: ba de skad gsung //
translated: has taught this.🔽“ Dedicate generosity, discipline, patience, and likewise perseverance,

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab byang chub yongs su bsngo bar gyis //
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab byang chub yongs su bsngo bar gyis //
translated: meditative concentration, and wisdom to enlightenment.

original: byang chub phung por zhen nas mchog 'dzin ma byed ces //
analyzed: byang chub phung por zhen nas mchog 'dzin ma byed ces //
translated: Do not cling to the aggregates of enlightenment and grasp at the highest.”

original: dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan par bya //
analyzed: dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan par bya //
translated: This is how it should be taught to beginners.

original: de ltar spyod pa legs 'tsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams //
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa legs 'tsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams //
translated: Thus, the moon-like ones who practice well,

original: 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang ni gnas yin te //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang ni gnas yin te //
translated: are the refuge, the protector, and the support for beings.

original: rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dren pa //
analyzed: rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dren pa //
translated: They are the reliance, the mind, the island, the guide, the leader,

original: gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog smra ba mi 'khrugs yin //
analyzed: gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog smra ba mi 'khrugs yin //
translated: the illuminating lamp, the supreme Dharma, and the unshakable one.

original: grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha gyon byed de //
analyzed: grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha gyon byed de //
translated: Those who possess great fame put on the armor of difficulty,

original: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min //
analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min //
translated: but not the armor of the aggregates, elements, and sense sources.

original: theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing yongs su bzung ba med //
analyzed: theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing yongs su bzung ba med //
translated: They are free of the ideas of the three vehicles and are without grasping.

original: mi ldog g-yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can yin;/
analyzed: mi ldog g-yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can yin;/
translated: They are irreversible, unshakable, and unperturbed.

original: de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med //
analyzed: de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med //
translated: They have such qualities and are free of conceptual elaboration.

original: the tshom som nyi yid gnyis bral zhing don dang ldan //
analyzed: the tshom som nyi yid gnyis bral zhing don dang ldan //
translated: They are free of doubt, uncertainty, and ambivalence and are meaningful.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur ba //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur ba //
translated: When they hear the perfection of wisdom, they do not turn back.

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya //
translated: They are not led by others and should be known to be irreversible.

original: 'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'//
analyzed: 'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'//
translated: “This Dharma of the guides is profound and difficult to see.

original: sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par 'gyur med pa //
analyzed: sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par 'gyur med pa //
translated: No one has realized it and no one will attain it.

original: de phyir phan mdzad brtser ldan byang chub brnyes nas ni /
analyzed: de phyir phan mdzad brtser ldan byang chub brnyes nas ni /
translated: Therefore, those who have attained awakening out of love and compassion

original: sems can tshogs sus shes snyam thugs khral chung bar mdzad //
analyzed: sems can tshogs sus shes snyam thugs khral chung bar mdzad //
translated: should not worry about who will know the assembly of beings.

original: sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod //
translated: “Beings delight in their abodes and desire objects.

original: @265b 'dzin la gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin //
analyzed: @265b 'dzin la gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin //
translated: They cling to them and are as ignorant and confused as the blind.

original: thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de //
analyzed: thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de //
translated: The Dharma to be attained is without location and without grasping.

original: des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin //
translated: Therefore, there is a dispute with the world.🔽The realm of space is in the eastern direction and the southern direction,

original: nam mkha'i khams ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang // de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pha mtha' yas //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang // de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pha mtha' yas //
translated: And likewise in the western direction and the northern direction, infinite.

original: steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snyed rnams na'ang yod //
analyzed: steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snyed rnams na'ang yod //
translated: It is in the zenith and nadir and in all ten directions.

original: tha dad gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur pa med //
analyzed: tha dad gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur pa med //
translated: It is not differentiated and is not distinguished.

original: 'dras pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma byon de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: 'dras pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma byon de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness of the past is the suchness of the future,

original: da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness of the present is the suchness of the arhats,

original: chos kun de bzhin nyid gang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: chos kun de bzhin nyid gang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness of all phenomena is the suchness of the Victorious Ones.

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med //
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med //
translated: This suchness of phenomena is all without distinction.

original: bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur pa //
analyzed: bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur pa //
translated: The Sugata's enlightenment is free from differentiated phenomena.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa //
translated: This is what a bodhisattva who wishes to attain

original: thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor //
analyzed: thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor //
translated: And with skill in means, they apply themselves to the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'dren pa'i shes rab med na thob par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: 'dren pa'i shes rab med na thob par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: Without the wisdom of the guides, they will not attain it.

original: bya zhig lus tshe dpag med brgya rtsa lnga bcu par //
analyzed: bya zhig lus tshe dpag med brgya rtsa lnga bcu par //
translated: Suppose a bird, after a hundred and fifty years,

original: gyur la 'dab gshog zad de nyam rtsal yod min na //
analyzed: gyur la 'dab gshog zad de nyam rtsal yod min na //
translated: were to wear away the peak of Mount Meru with its wings,

original: de yis sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir //
analyzed: de yis sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir //
translated: and then jump from the Heaven of the Thirty-three to Jambudvīpa.

original: bdag nyid mchongs na der ni nyam nyes gyur pa yin //
analyzed: bdag nyid mchongs na der ni nyam nyes gyur pa yin //
translated: It would be destroyed, falling from there.

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang //
translated: The five perfections of the victors

original: bskal pa phye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing //
analyzed: bskal pa phye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing //
translated: are practiced for many quintillions of eons,

original: smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bsten kyang //
analyzed: smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bsten kyang //
translated: and infinite vast aspirations are constantly relied upon in the world,

original: thabs med shes @266a *//
analyzed: thabs med shes @266a *//
translated: but without skillful means,

original: rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du lhung //
analyzed: rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du lhung //
translated: devoid of wisdom, they fall into being śrāvakas.

original: sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang //
translated: Those who desire to go forth in this Buddha Vehicle

original: 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang // phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid kyis brtul bya zhing //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang // phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid kyis brtul bya zhing //
translated: And be disciplined with a helpful mind and a loving attitude.

original: tha ba med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya //
analyzed: tha ba med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya //
translated: You should speak without harshness, honestly, and with gentle words.

original: 'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa //
translated: The elder Subhūti asked the protector of the world,

original: yon tan rgya mtsho'i nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol //
analyzed: yon tan rgya mtsho'i nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol //
translated: “Please teach the signs of being free from afflictions, O ocean of qualities!

original: mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba //
translated: How do those with great power avoid turning back?

original: de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol //
analyzed: de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol //
translated: Please teach just a fraction of such qualities, O Victorious One!

original: tha dad 'du shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra //
analyzed: tha dad 'du shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra //
translated: “Free from the perception of difference, speaking with appropriate words,

original: dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la brten mi byed //
analyzed: dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la brten mi byed //
translated: Not relying on other ascetics or brahmins,

original: mkhas pas dus rnams rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs //
analyzed: mkhas pas dus rnams rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs //
translated: The wise ones always abandon the three lower realms,

original: de dag dge bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtson //
analyzed: de dag dge bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtson //
translated: And they strive in the path of the ten virtues.

original: zang zing med par 'gro la chos ni rjes su ston //
analyzed: zang zing med par 'gro la chos ni rjes su ston //
translated: “Without material things, they teach the Dharma to beings,

original: chos la gcig tu dga' zhing rtag tu tshig 'jam ldan //
analyzed: chos la gcig tu dga' zhing rtag tu tshig 'jam ldan //
translated: Delighting solely in the Dharma, always speaking gently,

original: 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan //
analyzed: 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan //
translated: They are fully aware of going, coming, sleeping, sitting,

original: gnya' shing gang tsam blta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med //
analyzed: gnya' shing gang tsam blta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med //
translated: They look ahead only a plough’s length, and are undeluded in mind.

original: gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dben shing dag /
analyzed: gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dben shing dag /
translated: They are clean, wear clean clothes, and are pure in three ways,

original: rnyed 'dod ma yin khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa //
analyzed: rnyed 'dod ma yin khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa //
translated: They do not seek gain, but always want the Dharma, the best.

original: bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They have gone beyond the domain of Mara, and are not led by others.

original: bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan bsam gtan der mi gnas //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan bsam gtan der mi gnas //
translated: They meditate in the four meditations, but do not dwell in them.

original: @266b grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris med //
analyzed: @266b grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris med //
translated: They do not want fame, and are not bound up in anger.

original: khyim par gyur kyang rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags //
analyzed: khyim par gyur kyang rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags //
translated: Even as householders, they are always unattached to all things.

original: 'tsho ba'i phyir ni ya ngas longs spyod 'tshol mi byed //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i phyir ni ya ngas longs spyod 'tshol mi byed //
translated: They do not seek wealth for the sake of livelihood.

original: drag shul spyod sngags mi byed bu mo sbyor sngags min //
analyzed: drag shul spyod sngags mi byed bu mo sbyor sngags min //
translated: They do not use spells to harm, nor spells to have intercourse with women.

original: 'dod pa'i las can phro mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i las can phro mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed //
translated: They do not teach that women will become men if they perform rites.

original: rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson //
analyzed: rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson //
translated: They strive for the perfection of wisdom, which is the highest solitude.

original: 'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i sems kyang brtan //
analyzed: 'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i sems kyang brtan //
translated: They are free from fighting and quarreling and have a stable mind of loving kindness.

original: kun mkhyen 'dod cing brten la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan //
analyzed: kun mkhyen 'dod cing brten la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan //
translated: They desire and rely on omniscience and always have a mind that is inclined toward it.

original: mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo'i yul mtha' rnam par spangs //
analyzed: mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo'i yul mtha' rnam par spangs //
translated: They have abandoned the border regions and the barbarian lands.

original: rang gi sa la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra //
analyzed: rang gi sa la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra //
translated: They are like Mount Meru on their own ground, always without doubt.

original: chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson //
analyzed: chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson //
translated: They give up their lives for the sake of the Dharma and are diligent in practice.

original: mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya //
analyzed: mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya //
translated: These should be understood as the signs of irreversibility.

original: gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam shes rnams //
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam shes rnams //
translated: Form, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness

original: zab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma med cing rab zhi ba //
analyzed: zab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma med cing rab zhi ba //
translated: are profound, without intrinsic nature, and completely peaceful.

original: dper na mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug 'tshol ba ltar //
analyzed: dper na mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug 'tshol ba ltar //
translated: Just as an arrow shot into the ocean seeks out the bottom,

original: shes rab kyis ni brtags na phung po'i gting mi rnyed //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni brtags na phung po'i gting mi rnyed //
translated: when examined with wisdom, the depths of the aggregates are not found.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar zab gyur cing //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar zab gyur cing //
translated: A bodhisattva who is that profound

original: theg pa don dam chags med gang la phung po dang // khams dang skye mched yod min chos 'di rtogs pa de'i //
analyzed: theg pa don dam chags med gang la phung po dang // khams dang skye mched yod min chos 'di rtogs pa de'i //
translated: In the vehicle of the ultimate, which is free from attachment, there are no aggregates,

original: bsod nams yang dag grub pa de las ci zhig yod //
analyzed: bsod nams yang dag grub pa de las ci zhig yod //
translated: Elements, or sense-spheres. What merit could there be in realizing this teaching?

original: dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig /
analyzed: dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig /
translated: For example, a man who engages in the Dharma of desire,

original: bud med dus @267a *//🔽btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni //
analyzed: bud med dus @267a *// btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni //
translated: If he is not with a woman🔽For even a moment,

original: nyin gcig sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa //
analyzed: nyin gcig sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa //
translated: For as many thoughts as he has in a day,

original: de snyed bskal par byang chub sems dpas tho ba par 'gyur /
analyzed: de snyed bskal par byang chub sems dpas tho ba par 'gyur /
translated: For that many eons the bodhisattva will be reborn.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du //
translated: A bodhisattva who for many eons, for a thousand eons,

original: dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims srung byed kyang //
analyzed: dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims srung byed kyang //
translated: Gives to arhats and pratyekabuddhas, and guards morality,

original: gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos //
analyzed: gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos //
translated: But if he possesses the supreme perfection of wisdom,

original: brjod pa'i legs la sbyin dang tshul khrims char mi phod //
analyzed: brjod pa'i legs la sbyin dang tshul khrims char mi phod //
translated: His virtue surpasses that of generosity and morality.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te //
translated: A bodhisattva who meditates on the supreme wisdom,

original: de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing //
analyzed: de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing //
translated: And, rising from that, they proclaim the Dharma of nonattachment.

original: de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur bsngo na //
analyzed: de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur bsngo na //
translated: And, for the sake of the world, they dedicate it to enlightenment.

original: dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med //
analyzed: dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med //
translated: There is no merit in the three worlds equal to that merit.🔽They know that merit to be hollow, and likewise empty,

original: bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang // gsob dang ya ma brla dang snying po med par shes //
analyzed: bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang // gsob dang ya ma brla dang snying po med par shes //
translated: Worthless, insubstantial, and without essence.

original: de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyad spyod na //
analyzed: de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyad spyod na //
translated: Thus, practicing the wisdom of the sugatas,

original: spyod tshe bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin //
analyzed: spyod tshe bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin //
translated: They practice and gather immeasurable merit.

original: sangs rgyas kyis bshad rab tu sbyar cing rab bstan pa'i //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis bshad rab tu sbyar cing rab bstan pa'i //
translated: The Dharma taught by the buddhas, well applied and well taught,

original: chos 'di thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad shes nas //
analyzed: chos 'di thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad shes nas //
translated: All of it is known to be just a matter of words.

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod byas kyang //
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod byas kyang //
translated: Even if they were to speak for many quintillions of eons,

original: chos kyi dbyings la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med //
translated: The realm of phenomena would not be diminished or increased.

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin ces bya ba gang //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin ces bya ba gang //
translated: Whatever is called the perfection of the victors

original: chos de rnams kyang ming tsam du ni yongs su bsgrags //
analyzed: chos de rnams kyang ming tsam du ni yongs su bsgrags //
translated: Those dharmas are proclaimed to be just names.

original: yongs bsngo rlom sems @267b med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: yongs bsngo rlom sems @267b med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni //
translated: The bodhisattva who dedicates without pride

original: nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur //🔽'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yis //
analyzed: nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur // 'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yis //
translated: is not deficient and will reach supreme enlightenment.🔽When the wick of an oil lamp is burning,

original: snying po tshig min de med par yang de mi tshig /
analyzed: snying po tshig min de med par yang de mi tshig /
translated: it is not the first contact that burns the wick, nor is it the wick without that contact.

original: me lce phrad pa thams snying po tshig min la //
analyzed: me lce phrad pa thams snying po tshig min la //
translated: The flame of the lamp is not the wick’s burner,

original: me lce tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar //
analyzed: me lce tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar //
translated: nor is it the last flame that burns the wick, nor is it the wick without that flame.

original: dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog rig ma yin la //
analyzed: dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog rig ma yin la //
translated: The first thought is not the knower of supreme enlightenment,

original: de med par yang de la reg par nus ma yin //
analyzed: de med par yang de la reg par nus ma yin //
translated: nor is it possible to touch enlightenment without that thought.

original: tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi ba thob min la //
analyzed: tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi ba thob min la //
translated: The last thought does not reach the peace of enlightenment,

original: de med par yang de thob nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de med par yang de thob nus pa ma yin no //
translated: nor is it possible to reach it without that thought.🔽From the seed the sprout, from the sprout the leaves,

original: sa bon las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung //
analyzed: sa bon las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung //
translated: and from the leaves the flower and fruit arise.

original: de yang 'gags la shing yang med pa der min ltar //
analyzed: de yang 'gags la shing yang med pa der min ltar //
translated: The seed does not cease, nor does the tree exist without that cessation.

original: de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te //
analyzed: de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te //
translated: In the same way, the first thought is the cause of enlightenment,

original: de yang 'gags la byang chub med pa de ma yin //
analyzed: de yang 'gags la byang chub med pa de ma yin //
translated: And it is not that enlightenment is absent where it has ceased.🔽Just as a pot is gradually filled by the falling of many drops of water,🔽So the supreme enlightenment is gradually achieved by many small merits.

original: chu yi thigs pas bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar //🔽rim gyis nyung du nyung dus de yongs 'gengs pa ltar //
analyzed: chu yi thigs pas bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar // rim gyis nyung du nyung dus de yongs 'gengs pa ltar //
translated: And just as the first drop of water fills the pot in the end,

original: de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste //🔽rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste // rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur //
translated: So the first thought of enlightenment leads to the enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa'i chos spyod cing //
analyzed: stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa'i chos spyod cing //
translated: Practicing the teachings of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness,

original: mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan mar mi spyod pa //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan mar mi spyod pa //
translated: Without touching nirvana, without practicing with signs,

original: dper na mnyan pa mkhas pa phar 'gro tshur 'gro yang //
analyzed: dper na mnyan pa mkhas pa phar 'gro tshur 'gro yang //
translated: Like a skilled boatman who goes back and forth

original: mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhin //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhin //
translated: Without staying at either shore or in the middle of the stream,

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag /
translated: The bodhisattva who practices in this way does not think,

original: stobs bcus lung bstan byang chub @268a *//🔽reg 'gyur rlom sems med //
analyzed: stobs bcus lung bstan byang chub @268a *// reg 'gyur rlom sems med //
translated: “I will be predicted by the Buddhas, the Ten Powered Ones,🔽And will reach enlightenment.”

original: 'di la ci'ang med ces byang chub skrag pa med //
analyzed: 'di la ci'ang med ces byang chub skrag pa med //
translated: Nor does he think, “There is nothing here,” and fear enlightenment.

original: de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin //
translated: Such is the practice of the Sugata’s wisdom.

original: 'jig rten dgon pa'i lam dang mu ge nad bcas par //
analyzed: 'jig rten dgon pa'i lam dang mu ge nad bcas par //
translated: Seeing the world’s wilderness, famine, and disease,

original: mthong nas skrag pa med cing de nas go gyon te //
analyzed: mthong nas skrag pa med cing de nas go gyon te //
translated: they are not afraid, but don the armor.

original: phyi ma'i mu mthar rtag tu brtson zhing rab shes nas //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mu mthar rtag tu brtson zhing rab shes nas //
translated: Always striving and fully aware until the end of time,

original: yongs su skyo ba'i yid ni rdul tsam skye mi byed //
analyzed: yongs su skyo ba'i yid ni rdul tsam skye mi byed //
translated: they do not give rise to even a speck of weariness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing //
translated: The bodhisattvas who practice the Victor’s wisdom

original: phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes //
analyzed: phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes //
translated: know that these aggregates are primordially empty and unborn.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag sems can khams la snying rje 'jug /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag sems can khams la snying rje 'jug /
translated: Without resting in equipoise, they engage in compassion for the realms of sentient beings.

original: bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las yongs mi nyams //
analyzed: bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las yongs mi nyams //
translated: In the meantime, they never fall from the Buddha’s Dharma.

original: dper na skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan zhing //
analyzed: dper na skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan zhing //
translated: For example, a wise person who has all good qualities,

original: stobs ldan mi thub brtson byas sgyu rtsal cho ga shes //
analyzed: stobs ldan mi thub brtson byas sgyu rtsal cho ga shes //
translated: who is powerful, invincible, and persevering, who knows the arts and rituals,

original: 'phong dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing //
analyzed: 'phong dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing //
translated: who has perfected archery and many crafts,

original: sgyu ma sgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig /
analyzed: sgyu ma sgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig /
translated: who knows how to create illusions and is dedicated to the welfare of beings,

original: pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas par yongs bsdus nas //
analyzed: pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas par yongs bsdus nas //
translated: And he is surrounded by his father, mother, and wife.🔽He has many enemies and goes to a road in the wilderness,

original: dgra byed mang ba dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang // de yis dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu mang sprul te //
analyzed: dgra byed mang ba dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang // de yis dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu mang sprul te //
translated: And he conjures up many brave and heroic men.

original: bde bar song zhing phyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar /
analyzed: bde bar song zhing phyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar /
translated: He goes in comfort and returns home again.

original: de bzhin de tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang //
analyzed: de bzhin de tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang //
translated: In the same way, at that time, the wise bodhisattva

original: sems can khams rnams kun tu snying rje cher bskyed cing //
analyzed: sems can khams rnams kun tu snying rje cher bskyed cing //
translated: Generates great compassion for all the realms of sentient beings.

original: bdud bzhi dag dang sa gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas //
analyzed: bdud bzhi dag dang sa gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas //
translated: He transcends the four māras and the two levels,

original: @268b ting 'dzin mchog la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed //
analyzed: @268b ting 'dzin mchog la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed //
translated: And, abiding in the supreme samādhi, he does not touch awakening.

original: mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten //
analyzed: mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten //
translated: The wind rests in space, and the mass of water rests on that.

original: de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba 'di dag brten //
analyzed: de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba 'di dag brten //
translated: This great earth rests on that, and these beings rest on it.

original: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa //
analyzed: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa //

analyzed: bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' drod snyam de ni bdag nyid nyams //

analyzed: de lta bas na byang chub dam pa 'tshol ba yis //

analyzed: bsam pa drag ldan mkhas pas nga rgyal nges bcom ste //

analyzed: g-yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya //
