analyzed: rgyal ba 'das bar ma byon phyogs bcur gang bzhugs pa //
translated: The victors who have passed into nirvāṇa, those yet to come, and those now residing in the ten directions

original: kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin //🔽pha rol phyin 'di byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi //
analyzed: kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin // pha rol phyin 'di byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi //
translated: All have taken this path of the perfections, and none other than this.🔽This perfection is said to be the supreme light, lamp,

original: gsal dang sgron dang snang dang ston mchog yin zhes bshad //
analyzed: gsal dang sgron dang snang dang ston mchog yin zhes bshad //
translated: and illumination for those who have set out for supreme enlightenment.

original: ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mtshan nyid stong //
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mtshan nyid stong //
translated: Just as the perfection of wisdom is empty of any intrinsic marker,

original: chos 'di thams cad mtshan nyid de dang 'drar shes shing //
analyzed: chos 'di thams cad mtshan nyid de dang 'drar shes shing //
translated: so too should one understand all phenomena to be empty of any intrinsic marker.

original: chos rnams stong zhing mtshan ma med par rab shes na //
analyzed: chos rnams stong zhing mtshan ma med par rab shes na //
translated: When one fully understands that phenomena are empty and devoid of any intrinsic marker,

original: de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin //
translated: one who practices in this way is practicing the Sugata’s wisdom.

original: sems can yongs su rtog pa zas la 'dod byed cing //
analyzed: sems can yongs su rtog pa zas la 'dod byed cing //
translated: Sentient beings who crave for the food of conceptualization

original: 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang @271b ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor //
analyzed: 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang @271b ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor //
translated: and whose minds are attached to saṃsāra will always circle in saṃsāra.

original: bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yang dag min stong ste //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yang dag min stong ste //
translated: The two phenomena of self and “mine” are unreal and empty.

original: phyis pa bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la mdud pa bor //
analyzed: phyis pa bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la mdud pa bor //
translated: Later, he himself untied the knot in the sky.

original: dper na dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug bslang ba //
analyzed: dper na dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug bslang ba //
translated: For example, through the perception of fear, poison is ingested,

original: dug de khong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dug de khong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: but even though it has not entered the stomach, one faints.

original: de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa //
analyzed: de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa //
translated: In the same way, the childish accept “self” and “mine,”

original: bdag der 'du shes yang dag mi rtag skye zhing 'chi //
analyzed: bdag der 'du shes yang dag mi rtag skye zhing 'chi //
translated: and the perception of self arises and perishes, but is not real and impermanent.

original: ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan //
translated: As it is grasped, so is the thorough affliction taught.

original: bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs rnam par byang bar gsungs //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs rnam par byang bar gsungs //
translated: When “self” and “mine” are not observed, purification is taught.

original: 'di la gang yang nyon mongs rnam dag 'gyur med par //
analyzed: 'di la gang yang nyon mongs rnam dag 'gyur med par //
translated: Here, no one is purified or afflicted,

original: byang chub sems dpas shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs //
translated: and the bodhisattva realizes the perfection of wisdom.

original: dzambu'i gling na sems can ji snyed ma lus pa //
analyzed: dzambu'i gling na sems can ji snyed ma lus pa //
translated: All the sentient beings without exception in Jambudvīpa

original: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
analyzed: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
translated: generate the mind of supreme enlightenment,

original: lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas la //
analyzed: lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas la //
translated: and for many billions of years, they practice generosity,

original: kun kyang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur bsngo yang //
analyzed: kun kyang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur bsngo yang //
translated: and all of it is dedicated as a cause for enlightenment for the sake of the world.

original: gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa //
analyzed: gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa //
translated: Whoever strives for the supreme perfection of wisdom,

original: tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su mthun byed na //
analyzed: tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su mthun byed na //
translated: even if only for a single day,

original: de la sbyin pa'i phung pos bsod nams char mi phod //
analyzed: de la sbyin pa'i phung pos bsod nams char mi phod //
translated: the mass of his merit will surpass that of the former.

original: de phyir g-yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya //
analyzed: de phyir g-yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya //
translated: Therefore, always apply yourself to wisdom without distraction.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogi who practices the supreme perfection of wisdom,

original: snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med //
analyzed: snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med //
translated: though he generates great compassion, has no concept of sentient beings.

original: de che mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur //
analyzed: de che mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur //
translated: He becomes the object of generosity for all beings,

original: rtag tu yul 'khor bsad snyams don yod yongs su spyod //
analyzed: rtag tu yul 'khor bsad snyams don yod yongs su spyod //
translated: always enjoying the land and retinue as if it were unreal.

original: byang @272a *// chub sems dpa' gang 'dir yun ring 'brel ba yi //
analyzed: byang @272a *// chub sems dpa' gang 'dir yun ring 'brel ba yi //
translated: The bodhisattva, for the sake of liberating sentient beings

original: lha mi ngan song gsum gyi sems can dgrol ba'i phyir //
analyzed: lha mi ngan song gsum gyi sems can dgrol ba'i phyir //
translated: from the three realms of gods, humans, and lower realms,

original: lam yangs pha rol sems can khams la ston 'dod pas //
analyzed: lam yangs pha rol sems can khams la ston 'dod pas //
translated: wishing to show the vast path to the other shore of sentient beings,

original: nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin la brtson par bya //
analyzed: nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin la brtson par bya //
translated: should strive day and night in the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa yi rin chen mchog /
analyzed: mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa yi rin chen mchog /
translated: A person who has not previously found the supreme jewel,

original: dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te dga' ba las //
analyzed: dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te dga' ba las //
translated: And then, after a long time, he finds it again and is happy.

original: rnyed ma thag tu bag med gyur te stor na ni //
analyzed: rnyed ma thag tu bag med gyur te stor na ni //

original: stor bas rin chen mngon 'dod rtag tu sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: stor bas rin chen mngon 'dod rtag tu sdug bsngal lo //
translated: And because he has lost it, he is always miserable, longing for the jewel.

original: de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen lta bu yi //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen lta bu yi //
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva who has set out for supreme enlightenment

original: shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya //
translated: should not give up the practice of the perfection of wisdom, which is like a jewel.

original: rin chen rnyed nas blangs te rab tu brtson dkris nas //
analyzed: rin chen rnyed nas blangs te rab tu brtson dkris nas //
translated: Having found the jewel, he should take it up and wrap it carefully in clean cloth,

original: myur du 'gro bar byed pa zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin //
analyzed: myur du 'gro bar byed pa zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin //
translated: and then quickly go to a safe place.

original: nyi ma sprin dang bral ba'i 'od zer dra ba can //
analyzed: nyi ma sprin dang bral ba'i 'od zer dra ba can //
translated: When the sun, with its net of light rays, rises free from clouds,

original: mun nag thibs bo mun pa thams cad 'joms 'char ba //
analyzed: mun nag thibs bo mun pa thams cad 'joms 'char ba //
translated: it destroys the thick darkness and all gloom.

original: srin bu me khyer srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang // skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kun zil gyis gnon //
analyzed: srin bu me khyer srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang // skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kun zil gyis gnon //
translated: It outshines all the fireflies, all the creatures, all the hosts of stars and the light of the moon.

original: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin //
analyzed: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin //
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva who practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: mchog spyod stong pa dang ni mtshan ma med spyod pa //
analyzed: mchog spyod stong pa dang ni mtshan ma med spyod pa //
translated: the supreme practice, the practice of emptiness and signlessness,

analyzed: mkhas pas lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas 'gro kun dang // dgra bcom rang rgyal byang chub sems mang zil gyis gnon //
translated: And the many arhats, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas.

original: dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod pa //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod pa //
translated: For example, a prince who gives away his wealth and desires the benefit

original: kun gyi gtso bor @272b gyur te mngon par 'gro bya 'os //
analyzed: kun gyi gtso bor @272b gyur te mngon par 'gro bya 'os //
translated: Of all, becomes their chief and is worthy of being honored.

original: 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang dga' byed //
analyzed: 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang dga' byed //
translated: Even now, he delights many beings,

original: thabs thob gyur te rgyal srid gnas na smos ci dgos //
analyzed: thabs thob gyur te rgyal srid gnas na smos ci dgos //
translated: So what need to speak of when he has attained sovereignty and rules the kingdom.

original: de ltar shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang //
translated: In the same way, the wise bodhisattva who practices wisdom

original: bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'//
analyzed: bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'//
translated: Gives the gift of nectar and delights gods and humans.

original: 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang phan brtson //
analyzed: 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang phan brtson //
translated: Even now, he strives to benefit many beings,

original: chos kyi rgyal bor gnas par gyur na smos ci dgos //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal bor gnas par gyur na smos ci dgos //
translated: So what need to speak of when he abides as the Dharma King.

original: de yi tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur //
translated: At that time, Mara is filled with pain,

original: mya ngan nyam thag sdug bsngal yid mi bde nyam chung //
analyzed: mya ngan nyam thag sdug bsngal yid mi bde nyam chung //
translated: Distressed, sorrowful, suffering, unhappy, and weak.

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid nur 'gyur zhes //
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid nur 'gyur zhes //
translated: How can this bodhisattva be turned back from his mind?

original: 'jigs pa bstan phyir phyogs rnams sreg cing skar mda' gtong //
analyzed: 'jigs pa bstan phyir phyogs rnams sreg cing skar mda' gtong //
translated: To frighten them, he sets the directions ablaze and hurls meteors.

original: gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa drag ldan zhing //
analyzed: gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa drag ldan zhing //
translated: When those wise ones have a fierce intention

original: nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog don lta //
analyzed: nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog don lta //
translated: and look at the supreme meaning of the perfection of wisdom day and night,

original: de tshe lus sems dag ni mkha' 'gro bya ltar rgyu //
analyzed: de tshe lus sems dag ni mkha' 'gro bya ltar rgyu //
translated: then their body and mind move like a bird in the sky.

original: nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis glags rnyed ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis glags rnyed ga la 'gyur //
translated: How can the friends of darkness find an opportunity?

original: gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing //
analyzed: gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing //
translated: When the bodhisattvas fight and quarrel

original: phan tshun mi mthun khros pa'i sems dang ldan gyur pa //
analyzed: phan tshun mi mthun khros pa'i sems dang ldan gyur pa //

original: de tshe bdud ni dga' zhing mchog tu nyams bder 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe bdud ni dga' zhing mchog tu nyams bder 'gyur //
translated: then Mara is delighted and becomes supremely happy,

original: de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring 'gyur snyam //
analyzed: de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring 'gyur snyam //
translated: thinking, “They are far from the wisdom of the Victorious Ones.”

original: de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: They will be far from each other and will be like flesh-eaters.

original: gnyis ka rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis ka rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur //

original: sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod //
analyzed: sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod //

original: de tshe bdud rnams phyogs dang bcas te dga' bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe bdud rnams phyogs dang bcas te dga' bar 'gyur //
translated: At that time, the demons, together with their factions, will rejoice.

original: @273a *// lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis //
analyzed: @273a *// lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis //
translated: If a bodhisattva who has not received a prophecy

original: lung bstan thob la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom byed na //
analyzed: lung bstan thob la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom byed na //
translated: becomes angry and quarrels with one who has received a prophecy,🔽for as many moments of mind as he has faults,

analyzed: thab skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig ji snyed pa; ;de snyed bskal par gzhi nas go cha bgo bgos so //

original: sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg /
translated: The Buddha reached enlightenment through the perfection of patience.

original: sems 'di bzang ba min snyam dran pa skyed byed cing //
analyzed: sems 'di bzang ba min snyam dran pa skyed byed cing //
translated: If you think, “This mind is not good,” you should arouse mindfulness,

analyzed: so sor 'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed la //

analyzed: bslab dang bslab pa ma yin 'di gnyis mi rtog pa //

analyzed: de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dis slob //
translated: Whoever trains in that way is training in the Buddha’s teachings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lta'i bslab 'di shes //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lta'i bslab 'di shes //

analyzed: de ni gzhan yang bslabs nyams tshul khrims 'chal mi 'gyur //
translated: will not, even for the sake of his life, transgress the training or be immoral.

original: de ni sangs rgyas chos mnyes bya phyir 'di la slob //
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas chos mnyes bya phyir 'di la slob //

original: de ni bslab lhag bslab la mkhas te dmigs pa med //
analyzed: de ni bslab lhag bslab la mkhas te dmigs pa med //
translated: He is skilled in the training and the higher training, and is without reference points.

original: mkhas pa 'od byed rnams kyi shes rab de ltar slob //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'od byed rnams kyi shes rab de ltar slob //
translated: The wise who train in this kind of wisdom of the luminous ones

original: dge ba ma yin sems gcig tsam yang bskyed mi byed //
analyzed: dge ba ma yin sems gcig tsam yang bskyed mi byed //
translated: will not give rise to even a single unwholesome thought.🔽Just as darkness does not remain

analyzed: nyi ma mkha' la 'gro ba'i zer gyis zil gnon pa'i // mdun gyi bar snang la ni mun pa mi gnas bzhin //

original: shes rab pha rol phyin la bslab pa byas rnams kyi //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin la bslab pa byas rnams kyi //
translated: so it is for those who have trained in the perfection of wisdom.

original: pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur //
translated: All the perfections are included in this.

analyzed: @273b 'jig tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar //
translated: Just as the sixty-two views are included in the view of the transitory collection,

original: de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par gsungs //
analyzed: de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par gsungs //
translated: so too are all these perfections said to be included in this one.

original: dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbang po gzhan //
analyzed: dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbang po gzhan //
translated: Just as when the faculty of life is obstructed, the other faculties

analyzed: gang dag ji snyed yod pa thams cad 'gag par 'gyur //
translated: And all that exists, as much as there is, will cease.

original: de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi //
translated: Thus, the wise, the supreme ones who practice wisdom,

original: pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par gsungs //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par gsungs //
translated: Have been taught that all the perfections are contained here.🔽The wise bodhisattvas train in all the qualities

analyzed: byang chub sems mkhas nyan thos yon tan gang dag dang // de bzhin rang rgyal yon tan kun la slob byed cing //

analyzed: de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi bskyed de //

original: 'di ni bdag gis bslab bya yin snyam de phyir slob //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag gis bslab bya yin snyam de phyir slob //

original: mi ldog byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs pa yi //
analyzed: mi ldog byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs pa yi //

original: sems bskyed pa la bsam pa thag pas yi rang ba //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa la bsam pa thag pas yi rang ba //
translated: Who rejoice in the generation of the mind with a sincere intention,

original: stong gsum ri rab srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung rung //
analyzed: stong gsum ri rab srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung rung //
translated: Even if the three-thousandfold world were weighed against

original: rjes su yi rang dge ba de ni de lta min //
analyzed: rjes su yi rang dge ba de ni de lta min //
translated: The rejoicing in virtue, it would not equal it.

original: dge ba don gnyer phan 'dod sems can ji snyed pa //
analyzed: dge ba don gnyer phan 'dod sems can ji snyed pa //

analyzed: kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yi rang 'gyur //

analyzed: de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan thob gyur nas //
translated: Therefore, having attained the qualities of the Victorious Ones,

analyzed: sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chos sbyin byed //
translated: they give the gift of Dharma to the world in order to end suffering.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mi rtog chos rnams kun //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mi rtog chos rnams kun //

original: stong dang mtshan ma med dang spros med yongs shes pa //
analyzed: stong dang mtshan ma med dang spros med yongs shes pa //
translated: to be empty, signless, and free from elaboration

original: de ni shes rab gnyis kyis byang chub tshol mi byed //
analyzed: de ni shes rab gnyis kyis byang chub tshol mi byed //

analyzed: reg dang 'dod yon lnga la mngon par brtson gyur kyang //

analyzed: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la mngon brtson rnam par spyod //

analyzed: spyo ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu brdeg kyang rung //

original: bran mo rje bo la ni zlog tshigs mi smra yi //
analyzed: bran mo rje bo la ni zlog tshigs mi smra yi //

original: 'di yis bdag ni gsad par 'gyur du 'ong snyam nas //

analyzed: shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis 'jigs bcas zil gyis gnon //

original: de bzhin byang @277a *//
analyzed: de bzhin byang @277a *//
translated: In the same way,

analyzed: chub ched du byang chub mchog zhugs pa //

original: 'gro ba kun la bran 'gyur bzhin du gnas par bya //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la bran 'gyur bzhin du gnas par bya //

original: 'di las byang chub thob cing yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di las byang chub thob cing yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur //

analyzed: rtsva dang shing las me byung bas ni den yid sreg /

original: bdag gi bde ba btang nas re ba med sems kyis //
analyzed: bdag gi bde ba btang nas re ba med sems kyis //

original: sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par brtson //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par brtson //

analyzed: sems can don dang zhing spyod brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa //

analyzed: yang dag chos sgrub byed tshe yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur //

analyzed: de ni brtson 'grus pha rol phyin nyams le lo can //

analyzed: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dang po nas bzung ste //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste //

analyzed: gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson byed na //

analyzed: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad pas gsungs //

analyzed: gang zhig stong gsum rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten mkhyen //

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra bcom rang rgyal phul byas pa //

analyzed: sbyin pa'i @278a *//

analyzed: phung pos de la bsod nams char mi phod //

analyzed: gal te sems can la las tsan dan phur ma blangs //

analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod kyang //
translated: Even if a bodhisattva practices the five sense objects,

analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste //

analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dren pas gsungs //

original: sems can dag pa gang zhig de ltar khrims ldan pa //
analyzed: sems can dag pa gang zhig de ltar khrims ldan pa //
translated: “What pure being, who is thus disciplined,
